name: David Shatsky
title: Data Science · Capital Markets · Builder
bio: Data Science graduate from UW-Madison with hands-on experience in capital markets and entrepreneurship. Currently a Junior Broker at TP ICAP managing FX options, I've built automated trading systems, agentic AI tools, and co-founded a startup. I'm passionate about combining quantitative analysis with product thinking to build tools that solve real problems.

experience.title: FX Options Junior Broker
experience.description: Manage creation, pricing, and execution of complex OTC FX options strategies. Built a Python + SQL agentic AI interface for trade history queries, enabling self-serve analytics and 3× faster retrieval. Partner with internal teams to enhance liquidity platforms and reduce manual steps in trade lifecycle.

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: Led product strategy and development for a platform automating core startup processes for students. Built lightweight agentic AI tools in Python for profile scraping, teammate matching, competitor analysis, and job description generation. Coordinated design, engineering, and marketing teams from concept to launch.

experience.title: Data Analysis Intern
experience.description: Utilized Python, SQL, and Excel for post-trade analysis providing investment insights to institutional clients. Conducted migration of over a petabyte of data to Apache Cassandra. Developed anomaly detection system to flag insider trading using lead-lag analysis.

experience.title: Business Development Intern
experience.description: Analyzed market data for an emerging blockchain-backed business and pinpointed growth opportunities. Assisted with software testing, ensuring 100% compliance with business requirements for enterprise clients.
